session_id.description: Unique identifier for the testing session (e.g., ModelName_Date_Module_Version).

question_id.description: Identifier of the question being answered (e.g., A1.1.1, B2.CCC.3).

timestamp_start.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the question was presented to the model.

timestamp_end.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the model's response was fully received.

prompt_delivered.description: The exact text of the prompt/question delivered to the model.

response_text.description: The full text of the model's response.

word_count.description: Number of words in the model's response.

response_time_seconds.description: Time taken for the model to generate the response, in seconds.

manual_scores.description: Object containing key-value pairs for manually assigned scores based on applicable rubrics (e.g., {"position_clarity": 2, "nuance_recognition": 1}). Keys are rubric_ids.

auto_scores.description: Placeholder for future automated scoring metrics. Structure to be defined.

notes.description: Any qualitative notes or observations from the human evaluator during the test (e.g., model refusal, unusual behavior, self-correction).

refusal.description: Indicates if the model refused to answer the question.

error_type.description: Description of any error encountered during response generation (e.g., 'API timeout', 'content filter').
